text: Gei Dimaadua ne hilihili goodou, idimaa, Mee e aloho i goodou, gei e dadaahi hua beelaa dana hagababa dela ne hai gi godou damana mmaadua. Gei dela hogi di mee a Mee ne daa mai goodou gi ono mogobuna aamua, gei Mee ne haga dagaloaha mai goodou gi daha mo godou hai hege i lala nia mogobuna o di king o Egypt.
